QuickAction.Title: Dashboard templates
QuickAction.Description: Quickly create a dashboard with the help of predefined templates.

QuickAction.Title: Dashboard samples
QuickAction.Description: Check out our prebuilt sample dashboards.

QuickAction.Title: Pinboards
QuickAction.Description: Add widgets from different dashboards to a pinboard.

QuickAction.Title: Share dashboards
QuickAction.Description: Share dashboards with any existing or new by user using our flexible permission system.

QuickAction.Title: Public dashboards
QuickAction.Description: View the dashboards that are marked for public visibility.

QuickAction.Title: Schedule dashboards
QuickAction.Description: Export dashboards as image, PowerPoint, and Excel files to send them via email to anyone on a scheduled basis.

QuickAction.Title: Create slideshows
QuickAction.Description: Rotate dashboards at intervals and showcase them on large TVs publicly in an office environment.

QuickAction.Title: Invite users
QuickAction.Description: Add users and share dashboards with them.

QuickAction.Title: Create groups
QuickAction.Description: Create groups for managing multiple users and share dashboards to the group.

QuickAction.Title: My connected accounts
QuickAction.Description: View the connections that are authorized by you for data analytics.

QuickAction.Title: My notification settings
QuickAction.Description: Manage the system and email notifications.

QuickAction.Title: iOS Mobile App
QuickAction.Description: Get the branding:company_name mobile dashboard app on your iOS devices.

QuickAction.Title: Android Mobile App
QuickAction.Description: Get the branding:company_name mobile dashboard app on your Android devices.

QuickAction.Title: Provide feedback
QuickAction.Description: Tell us about your experience using the dashboards so that we can make them even better.
